name: Monks: Succession
description:
Monks: Succession is a party game for between 2-4 players. It's best played on controllers, though keyboards for two player matches can be used.

The game entails controlling a member of a religious sect of flightless bird people as you participate in the rite of succession.

Use your jetpack and laser breath to succeed in your ambition to become the next abbot!

Note: You may need a reasonably fast pc to play this game. The current alpha release has not been particularly optimized as it was designed to be shown at a game festival.

Controls GamePad

Left stick: Run and turn when flying

A (X on a playstation style controller): Jump, and to fire jetpack

B (Circle on a playstation style controller): Roll

Right trigger or X (Square on a playstation controller): Fire

Right Stick: Aim while on the ground

Keyboard
 Player 1

W: Jump and to fire jetpack
A, D: Run and turn when flying
S: Roll
Spacebar: Fire

Player 2

W: Jump and to fire jetpack
A, D: Run and turn when flying
S: Roll
Spacebar: Fire
